content:
Hi everybody!

I'm a mathematical physicist and computer scientist nearing retirement. I've been teaching engineering students for 25 years, my research interests are mainly in modeling and simulation.

I've found the development of proof assistants very interesting for a while, but the learning curve was to steep for a "hobby". This might change now and I'm looking for applications in my areas of interest.

To get started, I'm trying to formalize a few basic examples from a course on "mathematics for engineers". The Lean documentation - especially the "Math in Lean" book - is very helpful, but sometimes I am completely stuck and will surely come here for helpful advice. I'm not quite sure, which channel to use for that, but the beginner's channel is hopefully a good start.

I'm eager to meet you folks and send greetings from northern Germany
Peter
